tns:patch.author: ginchauspe
tns:patch.description: AmpCategoryClass.possibleValues returns a List with more elements than existing in the DB (and with null value)

script.lang: UPDATE amp_category_value SET index_column = 0 WHERE amp_category_class_id = (SELECT id FROM amp_category_class acc WHERE category_name LIKE 'Contact Title') AND category_value LIKE 'Dr' AND index_column = 1 AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM amp_category_value acv2 WHERE amp_category_class_id = (SELECT id FROM amp_category_class acc WHERE category_name LIKE 'Contact Title')) = 1
